pr_title: Fix batch ackset recycled multiple times.

timeline.message: Fix batch ackset recycled multiple times.

timeline.bodyText:
This is still not safe. There cannot be a race condition to resolve the recycling.
In this case it can happen:

thread-1 calls recycle and CAS succeeds
thread-2 gets a the object from pool
thread-3 sees recycled==false and does the CAS again, recycle a different object that is in use.

You cannot use Recyclable for objects with a shared ownership. Either change the logic to avoid race conditions, or use ref-counting.
